content: stripe and start your bind off when you have worked one row less than that number in the final colour hydrogen shawl 4 of 5 gauge dye works abbreviations credits k knit design catherine gamroth k2tog knit two stitches together photography kelly brown m1l make one left use the tip of the left needle to pick up from model kelly brown front to back the strand between the two needles knit through back sample knitting jeni mummery loop 1 stitch increased m1r make one right use the tip of the left needle to pick up from back to front the strand between the two needles knit through front © 2018 gauge dye works this pattern text and photos are for loop 1 stitch increased personal use only unless prior permission has been given p purl pattern last updated february 2018 p2tog purl two stitches together for questions please contact me at info@gaugedyeworks com pm place marker rs right side slm slip marker sts stitches tbl through back loop ws wrong side yo yarn over hydrogen shawl 5 of 5 gauge dye works
